title: Laos Consumer Price Index Cpi
description: Consumer Price Index CPI in Laos increased to 164.30 points in October from 160.60 points in September of 2022. Consumer Price Index CPI in Laos averaged 82.83 points from 2000 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 164.30 points in October of 2022 and a record low of 35.70 points in January of 2000. This page provides - Laos Consumer Price Index Cpi- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of the Lao PDR
